entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18 with temperature rising to minus 11 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18 with temperature rising to minus 11 by morning. Wind chill minus 25 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 8 April 2023
